column1: Marcos Juárez Airport (Spanish: Aeródromo Marcos Juárez
column2: (ICAO: SAOM)) is a public use airport located 4 kilometres (2 mi) west of Marcos Juárez
column3: a city in the Córdoba Province of Argentina.

column1: The Marcos Juarez VOR (Ident: MJZ) is located on the field.
